select rl.*,sl.config_name,s.name as signature_name,t.name as template_name from receive_log rl left join send_log sl on rl.api_log_id = sl.api_log_id left join signature s on rl.signature = s.code left join template t on rl.template = t.code
1 = 1
AND s.name LIKE concat('%',#{params.signatureName},'%')
AND t.name LIKE concat('%',#{params.templateName},'%')
AND rl.platform_name LIKE concat('%',#{params.platformName},'%')
AND sl.config_name LIKE concat('%',#{params.configName},'%')
and rl.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and rl.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
order by rl.create_time desc

SELECT platform_name as date, COUNT( * ) AS count, SUM( STATUS ) AS success FROM receive_log
1 = 1
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
GROUP BY platform_name ORDER BY count DESC limit 10

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%c.%e' ) AS date, COUNT( * ) AS count, SUM(status) as success FROM receive_log
1 = 1
and platform_id = #{params.platformId}
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' )
GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC
